source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud seems eager to press on.
target: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_00<tab>不浄の三塔のアルフィノは、出発したいようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_01<tab>Despite Vidofnir's predictably gloomy appraisal of your chances, Alphinaud is resolved to lead Ser Aymeric to the summit of Sohm Al. Rejoin your companions outside Moghome, and signal your readiness to depart to the lord commander.
target: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_01<tab>アルフィノは、アイメリクを先導してソーム・アル山頂へ向かった。ドラヴァニア雲海のモグモグホームにいる「アイメリク」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_02<tab>As Ser Aymeric shares his wonder at the incredible vista, you are suddenly hailed by Moghan, the moogle who first guided you to Zenith. Upon learning of your purpose in the Churning Mists, he assures you that the winds are perfect for carrying your call to Hraesvelgr's ears. Make your way to Zenith, and blow the moogles' horn once more.
target: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_02<tab>アイメリクと話したところ、モグタンと思わぬ再会をした。聖竜を呼び出すため、ドラヴァニア雲海の白亜の宮殿にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FAC01 /var>」でラッパを吹こう。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_03<tab>You look on as Hraesvelgr descends from the clouds, just as he did when first you came to Zenith─and wince inwardly as he greets your request for aid with the selfsame scorn. Undaunted, Aymeric and Alphinaud strive to win the great wyrm round with eloquence and reason, but it is not until Midgardsormr himself appears that Hraesvelgr finally assents to test you and your companions' resolve. Consult with Ser Aymeric on how best to approach the forthcoming trial.
target: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FAC01 /var>でラッパを吹いて、飛来した聖竜「フレースヴェルグ」に助力を頼んだ。アイメリクとアルフィノの必死の説得、そして、冒険者とミドガルズオルムの言葉で、フレースヴェルグは揺れ動いたようだ。聖竜は、冒険者たちが邪竜と戦う力があるかを「試練の地」で見極めるという。白亜の宮殿の「アイメリク」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_04<tab>Ser Aymeric informs you that he observed a wyvern landing just outside the palace, and concludes that it must be one of the “children” of whom Hraesvelgr spoke. Accost the waiting dragon.
target: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_04<tab>アイメリクと話した。試練の地へ向かうため、案内役である白亜の宮殿の「美しき翼の飛竜」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_05<tab>It would seem that the wyvern has come to bear you to the scene of your ordeal. Steel yourself, body and mind, for the trials of so ancient and powerful a being as Hraesvelgr are not like to be simple...nor less forgiving.

※Challenge Sohr Khai with other players via the Duty Finder, or with a party of NPCs via Duty Support. Both systems are accessible from the main menu as well as the dungeon's entrance point.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_05<tab>美しき翼の飛竜と話した。「天竜宮殿 ソール・カイ」へ向かい、聖竜の試練を受けよう。

※進入地点を調べて「サポートNPCと突入」するか、メインコマンドの「コンテンツサポーター」を選ぶことで、サポートNPCと一緒に攻略できます。
※プレイヤー同士のパーティで攻略する場合は、コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加してください。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_06<tab>You have weathered the trial of the great wyrm. Before returning to Zenith, it would seem wise to speak with Hraesvelgr.
target: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_06<tab>「天竜宮殿 ソール・カイ」を攻略した。フレースヴェルグの答えを聞いて、ドラヴァニア雲海の白亜の宮殿に戻ろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_07<tab>Hraesvelgr commends you and your companions for your unwavering determination, and pledges to aid you in the coming battle with Nidhogg. Inquire of Alphinaud how he fared in his own trial.
target: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_07<tab>フレースヴェルグは冒険者たちの力と覚悟を認め、邪竜と戦うことを誓った。白亜の宮殿にいる「アルフィノ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_08<tab>Your trials completed, Alphinaud ponders how much time you have to prepare for Nidhogg's assault. Scarcely have the words left his lips, however, when a thunderous roar echoes across the sky, signaling the advance of the Dravanian Horde. The time has come for the final reckoning with Nidhogg─to bring an end to his wrathful song.
target: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_08<tab>アルフィノと話したところ、邪竜の咆哮が響き渡った。ついに邪竜「ニーズヘッグ」が進軍を開始したようだ。最終決戦へ向かい「竜詩戦争」に終止符を打とう。
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_09<tab>
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_SEQ_10<tab>

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ser Aymeric outside Moghome.
target: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_TODO_00<tab>モグモグホームのアイメリクと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_TODO_01<tab>Blow the horn on the top floor of Zenith.
target: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FAC01 /var>でラッパを吹く
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_TODO_02<tab>アイメリクと話す
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_TODO_03<tab>美しき翼の飛竜と話す
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_TODO_04<tab>「天竜宮殿 ソール・カイ」を攻略する
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_TODO_05<tab>「天竜宮殿 ソール・カイ」を攻略する
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_TODO_06<tab>白亜の宮殿のアルフィノと話す
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_TODO_08<tab>

TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_TODO_23<tab>

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_005<tab>Lucia's report described Anyx Trine in detail, but her words failed to convey the overwhelming <var 1A 02 /var>strangeness<var 1A 01 /var> of standing here in the demesne of dragons.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_005<tab>ルキアからも報告を受けていたが、
ドラゴン族の棲処を訪れるというのは何とも不思議な気分だ。

source:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>Though I expected no better answer from Vidofnir, I take little pleasure from having been proven right. 'Twould seem that our presence at Zenith will be every bit as unwelcome as I had anticipated. But what is the ire of one great wyrm to a trio of self-confessed fools such as ourselves?
Let us begin our ascent.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>聖竜の態度が変わっていないらしいというのは、
残念ではありましたが、ここで止まるわけにはいきません。
さあ、霊峰「ソーム・アル」を登り、雲海を目指しましょう。

TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_011<tab>了解だ。
先導を頼むよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>Scout ahead if you wish, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We shall join you outside Moghome!
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>では、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
ひとまず山頂の「モグモグホーム」を目指そう。
さあ、出発だ！

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_015<tab>The lord commander seems lost for words. Nor can I blame him. I recall being similarly awestruck when I first beheld this vista.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_015<tab>さしものアイメリク卿も、
雲海の光景には圧倒されているようだね。
私も、初めて訪れた時のことを思い出してしまうよ。

source:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_020<tab>I had heard tales of the world above the clouds, but never did I dream...
One's mind paints a pale picture of its majesty.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_020<tab>……なんと雄大な景色なのだ。
百聞は一見にしかずとは、まさにこのことだな。
この感動は、とても言葉で言い尽くせるものではない……。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>Few live to see such wonders. I am reminded of my first visit to this peak, when Estinien and Ysayle yet walked at our side...
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>私たちも初めて訪れたときは、圧倒されたものです。
あの時は、イゼルとエスティニアンもいっしょでしたが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_022<tab>(-Churning Mists Moogle-)Kupopo? Is that you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_022<tab>(-雲海のモーグリ族-)くぽぽ？
誰かと思えば、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんくぽ？
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_023<tab>確か君は……えっと……。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_024<tab>(-Churning Mists Moogle-)Don't tell me you've forgotten my name, kupo!? After all we've been through together!
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_024<tab>(-雲海のモーグリ族-)くぽ！？　まさか忘れたくぽ？
ひどいくぽ……あんまりだくぽ……。
薪拾い役のくせして、失礼すぎるくぽ……。

source:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_025<tab>(-Churning Mists Moogle-)But at least <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> remember me!
You...you <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> remember me, don't you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_025<tab>(-雲海のモーグリ族-)もちろん、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんは、
モグのこと、覚えているくぽね？
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_Q1_000_000<tab>このモーグリ族の正体は？

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_A1_000_001<tab>How could I forget you, Moglin!
target: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_A1_000_001<tab>どう考えてもモグリン
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_A1_000_002<tab>やっぱりモグタン

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_A1_000_003<tab>Apologies, friend, but all moogles look the same to me...
target: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_A1_000_003<tab>モーグリなんて、どれもいっしょ

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_027<tab>(-Churning Mists Moogle-)H-How could you mistake me for that overstuffed throne-warmer!? I'm Moghan! The courageous moogle who guided you to Zenith, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_027<tab>(-雲海のモーグリ族-)ひ、ひどすぎるくぽ～！
おデブなモグリン様と見間違えるなんて、ひどいくぽ！
モグは、白亜の宮殿まで案内した「モグタン」くぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_028<tab>(-Churning Mists Moogle-)Phew! You seemed a bit hesitant for a moment there! But I'm sure you were just fondly recalling the time we camped near Zenith, right, kupo?
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_028<tab>(-雲海のモーグリ族-)さすがは<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、大正解くぽ！
いっしょにキャンプしたこと、覚えていてくれたくぽね！

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_029<tab>(-Churning Mists Moogle-)...I see, kupo. Then I suppose our time around the campfire meant less to you than I thought it did. It's “Moghan,” by the way... <sniff>
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_029<tab>(-雲海のモーグリ族-)ひどすぎて、いっそすがすがしい答えくぽ……。
もういいくぽ……モグの名前は「モグタン」くぽ。
いっしょにキャンプしたの忘れてたなんて、薄情すぎるくぽ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_030<tab>But putting our shared history to one side, what brings you and your friends to Moghome, kupo?
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_030<tab>ところで、お友だちまで連れてきて、
今日はいったい、どういった用事で雲海に来たくぽ？

TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_031<tab>なるほどくぽ……。
聖竜様に助けを求めに来たくぽね。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_032<tab>Well, I hope you've brought the horn, kupo! With the winds as gentle as they are, a good loud toot should reach the great wyrm's ears easily enough!
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_032<tab>ちゃんと、ラッパは持ってきてるくぽ？
この風向きなら、きっと「白亜の宮殿」のてっぺんで、
ラッパを吹き鳴らせば、聖竜様に届くはずくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_033<tab>That is good to hear, Moghan─thank you. We had best press on to Zenith, while the winds are in our favor.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_033<tab>それはよかった！
では、すぐにでも「白亜の宮殿」に向かうとしよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_034<tab>Now that was unexpected, kupo. Chieftain Moglin will want to hear about this!
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_034<tab>くぽぽ、すごいコトを聞いちゃったくぽ。
モグリン様に報告くぽ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_035<tab>Did you meet with Hraesvelgr already, kupo? You never know when the winds will pick up again!
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_035<tab>聖竜様には会えたくぽ？
まだなら、早く「白亜の宮殿」に行った方がいいくぽ。

TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_036<tab>さあ、モーグリ族からもらったラッパを吹き鳴らし、
聖竜「フレースヴェルグ」を呼ぼう。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_037<tab>We <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> win Hraesvelgr to our cause. Fail in this and Ishgard's fate is all but sealed.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_037<tab>いよいよだな……。
この交渉に、皇都の未来が懸かっているのだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>Another day, another trial. Such ordeals must seem almost mundane to you by now. Would that I could say the same.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>聖竜は「試練の地」と言っていたね。
その試練を乗り越えれば、助力を受けられるということか。
責任は重大だな……。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_045<tab>For the sake of Ishgard, I shall overcome whatever trial is placed before me. And I have no doubt that you will do the same, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_045<tab>どんなに厳しい試練だったとしても、
皇都の未来のためには、耐え抜かねばならない。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、互いに力を尽くそう。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_046<tab>I believe I spied a wyvern landing just outside the palace. It is doubtless one of the “children” of whom Hraesvelgr spoke.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_046<tab>どうやら、この下で待っている飛竜が、
聖竜がいっていた案内役らしいな……。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_047<tab>Come, my friends: let us not keep our escort waiting.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_047<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、アルフィノ殿、
さっそく試練の地に赴くとしよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_WYVERN02244_000_050<tab>My broodmates and I will bear you to the place of your trial. Make your preparations.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_WYVERN02244_000_050<tab>……フレースヴェルグ様より、言付かっている。
貴方たち人を、試練の地へと案内するようにな……。
覚悟が決まったのなら、ただちに向かおうぞ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_WYVERN02244_000_055<tab>Great Hraesvelgr honors you with this trial. Prepare to be sorely tested...
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_WYVERN02244_000_055<tab>まさかフレースヴェルグ様が、試練を与えるとは……。
さて、覚悟は決まったか？

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_WYVERN02244_000_060<tab>You have proven yourself in the eyes of great Hraesvelgr. I did not think such a thing possible...
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_WYVERN02244_000_060<tab>まさか、あの試練を乗り越えるとは……。
驚きを禁じ得ないよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_065<tab>Countless times have I fought the minions of Nidhogg, but never did I imagine that I would one day face Hraesvelgr himself.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_065<tab>邪竜の眷属と戦ったことはあるが、
まさか、聖竜と直接、剣を交えることとなるとはな。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>Oh...ohhh... Oh, my poor ribs... That was a painful reminder of a great wyrm's might...
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>やれやれ、生きた心地がしなかったよ……。
七大天竜の偉大さを、あらためて思い知らされた気分だ。
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_ALPHINAUD_000_071<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_072<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_073<tab>And had he truly meant us harm, we would not be standing here now. Plainly, his intent was to teach. His onslaught forced me to recall my training─about the speed of the dragon, his balance, his blind spots... It was, in short, a very thorough lesson.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_AYMERIC_000_073<tab>もっとも、相手は本気ではなく、
どこか教え導くかのような戦い方ではあったがね。
おかげで天竜の死角や、攻撃の特徴を把握することができた。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGLIN_000_074<tab>Ow-ow-ow-ow-ow...kupo. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let me begin by congratulating you on the completion of your trial.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGLIN_000_074<tab>イタタタタ……くぽ。
ダサ……いや、シブい名前の<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>よ。
まずは試練を乗り越えたこと、オメデトウと言わせてほしいくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGLIN_000_075<tab>For one with a name more befitting a jester, you fight with the savagery of a rabid demon.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGLIN_000_075<tab>おぬしの実に容赦のない攻撃っぷり、
まさしく鬼畜……いや、英雄の名にふさわしいと感心したくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGLIN_000_076<tab>Do you see how my wings are kinked? Even my pom aches! After this drubbing, I fear my loyal subjects will have to bear the load of my personal chores for quite some time, kupo. Possibly indefinitely.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGLIN_000_076<tab>おかげでモグの腰はリミットブレイク！
そんなこんなで、当分、働けそうにないくぽ！
面倒な仕事は、ほかのモーグリたちに頼むしかなさそうくぽ～。

source: TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_077<tab>What!? When I told you about <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s trial, I didn't mean for the <var 1A 02 /var>rest of us<var 1A 01 /var> to suffer...
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_077<tab>な、なんてことくぽ！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが、聖竜様の試練を受けると知って、
懲らしめてもらおうと、モグリン様を出陣させたのに……。
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGLIN_000_078<tab>……モグタンは、仕事量3倍くぽ。

source:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_079<tab><splutter> <var 1A 02 /var>Triple<var 1A 01 /var>!? But that's not fair!!!
There's no justice, kupo... None at all!
target:
TEXT_HEAVND103_02244_MOGHAN_000_079<tab>ひ、ひどすぎるくぽ～！
モグの計画が、ぱっぱらぱ～くぽ！
